definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: She was the soprano part leader in the University Choir, HKUSTSU.
sentences.chinese: 林氏曾爲香港科技大學學生會合唱團女高音聲部部長。

sentences.english: Soprano Tan Jing and Lei Jia will perform the title role Mulan.
sentences.chinese: 這部歌劇將由女高音譚晶和雷佳扮演主角木蘭。

sentences.english: Amanda:Tell your parents that the performer is a renowned soprano who seldom tours.
sentences.chinese: 告訴你父母演出者是一位很少巡迴演出的著名女高音。

sentences.english: The flute is the best coloratura soprano without doubt.
sentences.chinese: 長笛無疑是最好的花腔女高音。

sentences.english: The soprano and the pianist did not get together very well.
sentences.chinese: 這位女高音和這位鋼琴家配合不太好。

sentences.english: She has sung soprano in many major operas.
sentences.chinese: 她在很多大型歌劇中唱過女高音。

sentences.english: The soprano begins to sing amidst acclamation of the audience.
sentences.chinese: 女高音歌手在四座歡呼聲中開始演唱。

sentences.english: The star of this evening of the Redwood Concert is soprano Julia Zhu.
sentences.chinese: 今晚這場紅杉樹音樂會的主角是女高音朱佳莉。

sentences.english: It was a high soprano voice, almost like a voice of an angel.
sentences.chinese: 是女高音，聽着就像天使的聲音似的。

sentences.english: Is Coloratura soprano singing a way of focus singing ?
sentences.chinese: 花腔女高音的聲音頻率是多少？

sentences.english: She possesses a soprano voice of unusually fine quality.
sentences.chinese: 她有着音質特別好的女高音歌喉。
他嘲諷音樂會的女高音。

sentences.english: In-Hye Kim, soprano, is renowned as one of the best singers in Korea.
sentences.chinese: 女高音金麟惠是現時韓國享負盛名的歌唱家之一。

sentences.english: Prima donna, your song shall never die!
sentences.chinese: 首席女高音，你的歌聲永不磨滅。

sentences.english: The soprano was a chunky girl from California.
sentences.chinese: 女高音歌手是個來自加利福尼亞的壯碩姑娘。
